          <title>
            <string language="en">Wave diffraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle Beugung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diffraction de vague</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diffraction da onda</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations compare the diffraction of waves at gaps of different sizes.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave diffraction</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen vergleichen die Beugung der 
Wellen an den Abständen der unterschiedlichen Größen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations comparent la diffraction des 
vagues aux lacunes de différentes tailles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações comparam o diffraction das 
ondas em aberturas de tamanhos diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni confrontano la diffrazione 
delle onde alle lacune dei formati differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις συγκρίνουν τη διάθλαση των 
κυμάτων στα χάσματα των διαφορετικών μεγεθών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones comparan la difracción de 
ondas en los boquetes de diversas tallas.</string>
          </description>
